messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] typographical hell
messages.msgSnippet: HEY!  I remember during the campaign of George Bush the first and Dan Quayle somebody giving a speech at a rally for Mr. Quayle said in regards to abortion ...
messages.messageBody:
HEY! I remember during the campaign of George Bush the first and Dan
Quayle somebody giving a speech at a rally for Mr. Quayle said in regards
to abortion ... "We were all feces once..."
Anyone remember who that was? I can't believe I forgot that.

Deb L, not sure how I got down this path...
